about.title: C. Murad Özsert - About
about.meta_description: Welcome to C. Murad Özsert's personal website. Learn more about him...
about.slide1_paragraph1: When I started at Boğaziçi University Computer Engineering in 2003, I was actually embarking on a long journey, not just a department. I was following my curiosity for technology — but back then, I didn't know this curiosity would first lead me to the regular rhythm of the corporate world, and later to the ups and downs of the entrepreneurial scene.
about.slide1_paragraph2: I spent my early years developing software, designing products, and building systems for large corporate companies. Later, I worked in more agile environments at medium-sized companies. This taught me what speed, flexibility, and direct impact mean. During this process, I had the chance to develop products that directly touched the lives of millions by working in different sectors such as finance, telecom, and logistics. Every different product, every different sector, was a new perspective and learning area for me.
about.slide1_paragraph3: Then, saying, 'It's time to chart your own course,' I embarked on the entrepreneurial path I had long wanted to experience. After a long period of research, this motivation turned into the Yolda.com story. Together with Volkan Özkan, whom I met (and later became friends with), we found ourselves in the world of entrepreneurship.
about.slide2_paragraph1: Yolda.com was born with the dream of transforming the logistics sector with technology. Within 2 years, the startup expanded from Turkey to Germany and Europe, receiving over $10 million in investment. This gave me the opportunity to work with leading and global investors. I was selected into the Endeavor family, consisting of founders of fast-growing startups who make a difference. This entrepreneurial journey pushed me out of my comfort zone and taught me to deal with a new crisis and another uncertainty every day. (The first month we founded the company, the pandemic affected the whole world, which was a sign of how tough the journey would be.)
about.slide2_paragraph2: This challenging time between 2020 and 2024, which took place sharp changes in the investment ecosystem's perspective on startups and local-global economic fluctuations, was sometimes exciting and sometimes stressful — but in every aspect, it was extremely instructive and transformative. Throughout all these ups and downs, I always focused on staying on the road, developing, creating value, and making a difference.
about.slide2_paragraph3: Due to the high capital requirements of Yolda.com's business model and the tightening of monetary policies in the investment world, it became impossible to achieve the high investment we aimed for when founding the company. In light of all these developments, after exiting the company to one of Turkey's leading logistics companies, I found myself at a new crossroads. I turned my focus to artificial intelligence and to understanding, explaining, and developing AI-powered products for its transformative power in today's world.
about.slide3_paragraph1: Now, I continue to work on building innovative products that blend technology and humanity. In addition to the transformative effects of artificial intelligence on our lives, I believe it has the potential to reshape our ways of thinking and working — in short, the whole world itself. A future where those who can adapt this potential to their own business will continue to survive is not far away.
about.slide3_paragraph2: If you want to follow this new world together, where small teams in terms of team size but large in terms of impact will multiply, you can subscribe to my weekly AI newsletter.

topics.title: C. Murad Özsert - Speaking Topics
topics.vol1_title: Thought Exercises on Artificial Intelligence Vol.1 - The Philosophy of Transformation
topics.vol1_topic1_title: Industrial Revolution, Internet, and Artificial Intelligence
topics.vol1_topic1_modal_p1: Fundamental Dynamics of Transformation: The industrial revolution transformed physical production power; the internet transformed access to information; artificial intelligence is transforming decision-making and production processes.
topics.vol1_topic1_modal_p2: Impacts on Labor and Society: The industrial revolution replaced muscle power with machines; the internet created knowledge work, and now artificial intelligence is automating cognitive tasks.
topics.vol1_topic1_modal_p3: Resistance to Innovation: All three transformations initially faced great resistance. Business models, education systems, and social structures were reshaped.
topics.vol1_topic1_modal_p4: Speed and Spread: The industrial revolution spread slowly and regionally; the internet was global but physical; artificial intelligence is digital, invisible, and spreading very fast.
topics.vol1_topic1_modal_p5: Economic and Political Power Shifts: Each transformation created new leading countries, new companies, and new wealth distributions. Artificial intelligence is making this change faster and deeper.
topics.vol1_topic1_modal_p6: What to Do Today? Understanding these transformations is not just historical knowledge, but also a matter of strategic preparation. To survive, you must adapt; to make a difference, you must lead the transformation.
topics.vol1_topic2_subtitle: Solo Entrepreneurship in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
topics.vol1_topic2_modal_p1: Empowered Individuals with AI: AI tools enable individuals to do what previously required large teams or companies. Many functions like marketing, sales, content creation, and customer service can now be automated.
topics.vol1_topic2_modal_p2: Low Cost, High Efficiency: The high startup costs that were a major barrier in traditional entrepreneurship are significantly reduced thanks to AI. One person, with the right tools, can reach a global market and manage operations efficiently.
topics.vol1_topic2_modal_p3: New Business Models and Opportunities: AI makes it easier to offer personalized products and services for niche markets. Solopreneurs can succeed in areas where big companies struggle.
topics.vol1_topic2_modal_p4: Freedom and Flexibility: Solopreneurship offers great freedom in working hours, location, and style. AI supports this freedom by taking over routine tasks, allowing the entrepreneur to focus on strategy and creativity.
topics.vol1_topic2_modal_p5: Challenges and Considerations: Working alone brings challenges like isolation, maintaining motivation, and having all responsibility on one person. Also, effective use of AI tools requires continuous learning and adaptation.
topics.vol1_topic2_modal_p6: Is This the Entrepreneurship Model of the Future? Solopreneurship is becoming an increasingly popular and accessible model in the age of AI, offering individuals a significant opportunity to maximize their potential.
topics.vol1_topic3_modal_p1: Revolution in Organizational Structures: AI agents (autonomous software entities) have the potential to radically change how companies operate. Hierarchical structures may give way to more fluid, decentralized, and task-oriented teams.
topics.vol1_topic3_modal_p2: Peak Efficiency and Automation: Agents can handle complex tasks like data analysis, reporting, customer interaction, and supply chain management with little or no human intervention. This means a huge increase in operational efficiency.
topics.vol1_topic3_modal_p3: Transformation in Decision-Making: AI agents can help make faster and more accurate decisions by analyzing large datasets. Human decision-makers can focus on strategic and creative thinking.
topics.vol1_topic3_modal_p4: Human-Agent Collaboration: In future organizations, humans and AI agents will work together. Human skills like emotional intelligence, creativity, and ethical judgment will combine with agents' analytical and processing power to create new synergy.
topics.vol1_topic3_modal_p5: New Roles and Skills: This transformation will require new skills for employees, such as managing, supervising, and developing agents.
topics.vol1_topic3_modal_p6: Ethical and Security Concerns: The spread of autonomous agents brings important ethical and security questions like data privacy, security vulnerabilities, and accountability for decisions. Effective policies and oversight mechanisms are critical.
topics.vol1_topic4_title: Data Culture in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
topics.vol1_topic4_subtitle: Whoever Owns the Data, Owns the Future
topics.vol1_topic4_modal_p1: What is Corporate Memory and Why is it Important? Corporate memory is the sum of an organization's experiences, knowledge, expertise, and past decisions. It is critical for gaining a competitive advantage, learning from mistakes, and fostering innovation.
topics.vol1_topic4_modal_p2: AI and Big Data: AI enables more effective management of corporate memory by processing vast amounts of structured and unstructured data (emails, reports, meeting notes, customer feedback, etc.).
topics.vol1_topic4_modal_p3: Access and Sharing of Information: AI-powered systems allow employees to quickly access the information they need and easily share it within the organization. This breaks down silos and increases collaboration.
topics.vol1_topic4_modal_p4: Learning Organizations: AI can turn corporate memory into a dynamic and continuously learning structure. It can offer insights for future decisions by learning from past data and experiences.
topics.vol1_topic4_modal_p5: Information Loss and Bias: Information loss due to employee turnover (corporate amnesia) can be reduced with AI. However, biases in the data used to train AI systems can also be reflected in corporate memory and lead to wrong decisions.
topics.vol1_topic4_modal_p6: Whoever Owns the Data, Owns the Future: In the age of AI, companies that effectively manage corporate memory and use data as a strategic asset will stand out in competition and shape the future.
topics.vol2_title: Thought Exercises on Artificial Intelligence Vol.2 - Transformation of Sectors
topics.vol2_topic1_title: The Transforming Intelligence of Finance with AI
topics.vol2_topic1_subtitle: Making Sense of Data is Now Very Easy
topics.vol2_topic1_modal_p1: Algorithmic Trading and Portfolio Management: AI develops algorithmic trading strategies by analyzing market data and predicting trends. Personalized portfolio management and robo-advisory services are becoming widespread.
topics.vol2_topic1_modal_p2: Risk Management and Fraud Detection: AI plays a critical role in detecting anomalous transaction patterns and potential fraud attempts in real time. Credit risk assessments become more accurate and faster.
topics.vol2_topic1_modal_p3: Customer Service and Personalization: Chatbots and virtual assistants provide 24/7 responses to customer inquiries. AI analyzes customer data to offer personalized financial products and advice.
topics.vol2_topic1_modal_p4: Operational Efficiency: Manual processes like evaluating credit applications, compliance checks (RegTech), and document processing are automated, reducing operational costs and increasing efficiency.
topics.vol2_topic1_modal_p5: New Financial Products and Markets: AI supports the development of new financial instruments and markets (e.g., decentralized finance - DeFi). Data-driven insurance (InsurTech) models are emerging.
topics.vol2_topic1_modal_p6: Regulatory Challenges and Ethical Issues: Algorithmic bias, data privacy, and cybersecurity are important regulatory and ethical challenges for the use of AI in the financial sector.
topics.vol2_topic2_subtitle: An Unmanned Experience in the Age of AI
topics.vol2_topic2_modal_p1: Personalized Customer Experience: AI analyzes customer data (purchase history, browsing behavior, preferences) to offer each customer tailored product recommendations, promotions, and content.
topics.vol2_topic2_modal_p2: Supply Chain and Inventory Optimization: AI is used for demand forecasting, optimizing inventory levels, and improving logistics processes. This reduces excess stock and stockouts.
topics.vol2_topic2_modal_p3: Smart Stores and Cashierless Checkout: Smart stores equipped with sensors, cameras, and AI-powered systems allow customers to pick up products and leave, with payment processed automatically (e.g., Amazon Go).
topics.vol2_topic2_modal_p4: Dynamic Pricing: Product prices can be adjusted in real time based on factors like competitor prices, demand, supply, and customer behavior.
topics.vol2_topic2_modal_p5: Virtual Try-On and Augmented Reality (AR): Customers can virtually try on clothes or see how furniture would look in their homes using AR. This enhances the online shopping experience.
topics.vol2_topic2_modal_p6: AI in Customer Service: Chatbots and virtual assistants answer frequently asked questions, provide product information, and help with order tracking. This increases customer satisfaction and reduces operational costs.
topics.vol2_topic3_title: End-to-End Traceability in Logistics with AI
topics.vol2_topic3_subtitle: Talking Agents, Control Towers, and More
topics.vol2_topic3_modal_p1: Smart Route Optimization: AI plans the most efficient delivery routes by considering factors like traffic, weather, fuel costs, and delivery priorities.
topics.vol2_topic3_modal_p2: Warehouse Management and Automation: Autonomous robots perform tasks like inventory management, product placement, and order preparation in warehouses. AI optimizes warehouse layout and workflows.
topics.vol2_topic3_modal_p3: Demand Forecasting and Inventory Management: More accurate demand forecasts are made by analyzing historical data, market trends, and external factors. This reduces inventory costs and the risk of stockouts.
topics.vol2_topic3_modal_p4: Real-Time Tracking and Monitoring: IoT sensors and AI monitor the location, condition (temperature, humidity, etc.), and security of shipments in real time. Potential problems are detected proactively.
topics.vol2_topic3_modal_p5: Autonomous Vehicles and Drone Deliveries: Autonomous trucks and delivery drones can increase efficiency and speed by reducing human intervention in logistics operations.
topics.vol2_topic3_modal_p6: Risk Management and Predictive Maintenance: AI can predict potential supply chain disruptions (e.g., natural disasters, strikes) and enable preventive measures. Predictive maintenance plans are created for vehicles and equipment.
topics.vol2_topic4_subtitle: How Will the Transformation Started by the Internet Evolve with AI?
topics.vol2_topic4_modal_p1: Hyper-Personalization: AI offers a completely personalized shopping experience based on each user's individual preferences, behaviors, and past interactions. Everything from homepage layout to product recommendations is dynamically adapted.
topics.vol2_topic4_modal_p2: Visual and Voice Search: Users can search for products using images or voice commands. AI understands these inputs to find the right products and simplify the shopping process.
topics.vol2_topic4_modal_p3: Smart Chatbots and Virtual Shopping Assistants: Advanced AI-powered chatbots not only answer questions but also proactively make product recommendations, offer style advice, and guide users through the shopping process.
topics.vol2_topic4_modal_p4: Dynamic Pricing and Promotions: Personalized prices and promotions can be offered instantly based on user loyalty, purchasing potential, and market conditions.
topics.vol2_topic4_modal_p5: Product Experience with Augmented Reality (AR): Customers can make more informed purchasing decisions by virtually trying on products (furniture, clothes, makeup, etc.) in their own environment or on themselves.
topics.vol3_title: Thought Exercises on Artificial Intelligence Vol.3 - The Human-AI Relationship
topics.vol3_topic1_title: The New Role of Human in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
topics.vol3_topic1_modal_p1: Transformation of Jobs, Not Disappearance: While AI automates some routine and repetitive tasks, it also creates new roles and opportunities for humans. The important thing is to adapt to this change.
topics.vol3_topic1_modal_p2: The Value of Human-Specific Skills is Increasing: Skills like critical thinking, creativity, emotional intelligence, complex problem-solving, and ethical judgment are becoming even more important in areas where AI cannot compete.
topics.vol3_topic1_modal_p3: Human-AI Collaboration: In the future, many jobs will require humans and AI systems to work together. People will make more strategic decisions using the data and analyses produced by AI.
topics.vol3_topic1_modal_p4: Continuous Learning and Reskilling/Upskilling: In this era of rapid technological change, it is vital for individuals to continuously learn new things and update their skills throughout their careers.
topics.vol3_topic1_modal_p5: Skill in Effectively Using AI Tools: Regardless of the sector, being able to effectively use AI tools and platforms will become a fundamental skill for the future workforce.
topics.vol3_topic1_modal_p6: HR 4.0: Human Resources departments will play a key role in ensuring employees adapt to this new era, creating the right training and development programs, and fostering a corporate culture that encourages human-AI collaboration.
topics.vol3_topic2_title: The Rise of Artificial Intelligence in Software Development
topics.vol3_topic2_subtitle: Line by Line Change: Will AI Eat Software Development?
topics.vol3_topic2_modal_p1: Code Generation and Completion: AI-powered tools (e.g., GitHub Copilot) accelerate the software development process by providing developers with code suggestions, automatically writing routine code blocks, and even generating simple functions.
topics.vol3_topic2_modal_p2: Error Detection and Correction: AI can detect potential errors, security vulnerabilities, and performance issues in code more quickly and effectively than humans, and even offer correction suggestions.
topics.vol3_topic2_modal_p3: Test Automation: AI can be used in processes such as creating test scenarios, generating test data, and automatically running tests, making testing processes more comprehensive and efficient.
topics.vol3_topic2_modal_p4: Coding with Natural Language (Low-Code/No-Code Approaches): AI can enable even non-technical individuals to develop applications by converting requirements expressed in natural language into code.
topics.vol3_topic2_modal_p5: Project Management and Estimation: AI can help estimate project durations, costs, and resource needs more accurately by analyzing past project data.
topics.vol3_topic2_modal_p6: Is the Role of the Developer Changing? AI will not eliminate developers; on the contrary, it will be a tool that allows them to focus on more creative, complex, and strategic tasks. Developers will take on more roles in areas like system design, architecture, and AI model supervision.
topics.vol3_topic3_title: The New Era of AI-Powered Customer Experience
topics.vol3_topic3_subtitle: From First Contact to Loyalty: Will an Unmanned Experience Satisfy?
topics.vol3_topic3_modal_p1: 24/7 Personalized Support: AI-powered chatbots and virtual assistants provide customers with instant, personalized responses around the clock, eliminating wait times and resolving basic issues.
topics.vol3_topic3_modal_p2: Proactive Customer Service: AI can identify potential problems or needs in advance by analyzing customer data, enabling companies to proactively reach out to customers and offer solutions.
topics.vol3_topic3_modal_p3: Empathetic Interaction with Sentiment Analysis: Advanced AI systems can analyze emotional cues in customer writings or voice tones to understand customer dissatisfaction or frustration and generate more empathetic responses accordingly.
topics.vol3_topic3_modal_p4: Personalized Journeys: AI designs a personalized customer journey for each customer based on their interaction history and preferences, delivering the right message and offer at the right time.
topics.vol3_topic3_modal_p5: Empowering Human Support Agents: AI takes over routine and repetitive tasks, allowing human support agents to focus on more complex and emotionally intelligent issues. It also enhances their performance by providing instant information and solution suggestions.
topics.vol3_topic3_modal_p6: Feedback Analysis and Continuous Improvement: AI automatically analyzes customer feedback (surveys, comments, social media) to identify shortcomings in service quality and areas for improvement.
topics.vol3_topic4_title: The Impact of Creativity's New Partner in the Design World
topics.vol3_topic4_subtitle: Has the Place Where Dreams Begin Become More Important?
topics.vol3_topic4_modal_p1: Idea Generation and Source of Inspiration: AI tools can accelerate designers' creative processes and serve as a source of inspiration for new ideas by offering countless visual variations in different styles and concepts.
topics.vol3_topic4_modal_p2: Automated Design Tasks: Some routine design tasks like logo design, color palette creation, and basic layout adjustments can be automated by AI, giving designers time to focus on more strategic work.
topics.vol3_topic4_modal_p3: Personalized Design Experiences: AI can generate personalized website designs, product interfaces, or marketing materials based on user data.
topics.vol3_topic4_modal_p4: Data-Driven Design Decisions: Designers can make data-driven decisions about which designs are more popular with users or which colors are more effective by using AI analytics.
topics.vol3_topic4_modal_p5: Increased Speed in Prototyping and Iteration: AI enables rapid prototyping of design ideas and easy testing of different versions, shortening iteration cycles.
topics.vol3_topic4_modal_p6: The Designer's Role is Evolving: AI can shift the designer from being a 'curator', 'director', or 'collaborative partner with AI'. Human intuition and aesthetic sense will continue to be critical in guiding the results produced by AI. The starting point of dreams, i.e., concept and vision, may become even more important.
